vote.title: Authorize acquisition of a drainage easement and a temporary workspace easement from Wycliff Investments, LLC, for a total of approximately 1,875 square feet of land located on Knight Street near its intersection with Sylvester Street for the Throckmorton-Reagan Drainage Improvements Project - Not to exceed $137,032.00 ($133,032.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $4,000.00) - Financing: Stormwater Drainage Management Capital Construction Fund
